metadata.title: CVE-2015-8926 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The archive_read_format_rar_read_data function inarchive_read_support_format_rar.c in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted rar archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8926` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.2').
